item.title: Kate add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Kate add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "If you do follow your bliss you put yourself on a kind of track that has been there all the while, waiting for you, and the life that you ought to be living is the one you are living. Follow your bliss and don't be afraid, and doors will open where you didn't know they were going to be." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kate add a quote by May Sarton
item.description: "We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be." -- May Sarton

item.title: Kate add a quote by Benjamin Spock
item.description: "Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do." -- Benjamin Spock

item.title: Kate add a quote by Rollo May
item.description: "It is an ironic habit of human beings to run faster when they have lost their way." -- Rollo May

item.title: Kate add a quote by Jacqueline Carey
item.description: "All paths are present, always... and we can but choose among them." -- Jacqueline Carey

item.title: Kate add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, 'Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous?' Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Kate add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "Like all magnificent things, it's very simple." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Kate add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding... And could you keep your heart in wonder at the daily miracles of your life, your pain would not seem less wondrous than your joy" -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Kate add a quote by Norton Juster
item.description: "The most important reason for going from one place to another is to see what's in between, and they took great pleasure in doing just that." -- Norton Juster

item.title: Kate add a quote by Dan Millman
item.description: "There are no ordinary moments." -- Dan Millman

item.title: Kate add a quote by Dan Millman
item.description: "The journey is what brings us happiness not the destination." -- Dan Millman

item.title: Kate add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it." -- Aristotle
